text:
I am developping JSPages where I do a SQL query on an Access Database via ODBC.
When I do a SQL query when tomcat was just started before, this query takes a 
lot of time. Then, when the result is sent back, everything goes well. All the 
others SQL queries take normal time.

PS : I am using a form to pass the values of my SQL queries.
creator: cyrcyr@hotmail.com

text:
There isn't enough detail to attempt to duplicate.  I'm not sure if it
could be related to the first session creation.  I'm marking this bug "invalid".
If you can supply a simple web application that demonstrates the problem in
a current release of Tomcat, enter a new report and we'll take a look to see
if the delay is caused by Tomcat. Thanks.
creator: Larry.Isaacs@sas.com
